ConsistencyLevel.description: Represents the manner and timing in which the successful write or update of an object is reflected in a subsequent read operation of that same object.

DirectoryArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the Directory where objects reside. For more information, see arns.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of items to be retrieved in a single call. This is an approximate number.

PolicyReference.description: The reference that identifies the policy object.
